title: Problems in Lego Island
content:
I was playing Lego Island today and there is somehting to compare between Win2000 or lower and WinXP. How come it won't work in Windows XP?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] -----------------------------

I am doctor saveous P brain the thad... The P stands for puzzle... I am.. the puzzle master!
